title: Place context

xdm:localTime.title: Local time
xdm:localTime.description: The local time using RFC3339 with a stated time zone offset such as "2001-07-04T12:08:56-07:00". An example formatting pattern is "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX".

xdm:ianaTimezone.title: Iana Timezone
xdm:ianaTimezone.description: Timezone of the device represented as a standard timezone string. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones.This field could be used to collect data that may be considered to be sensitive or personal. Go here: https://www.adobe.com/go/xdm-spi-and-pii for more information.

xdm:localTimezoneOffset.title: Local time zone offset
xdm:localTimezoneOffset.description: The current, local time zone offset in minutes from UTC for the localTime in this object.  This will include the current DST offset if applicable.

xdm:geo.title: Geo
xdm:geo.description: The geographic location where the experience was delivered.

xdm:POIinteraction.title: POI interaction
xdm:POIinteraction.description: The point of interest (POI) interaction details.

xdm:POIDetail.title: POI detail
xdm:POIDetail.description: Detail of the POI that cause the event.

xdm:poiDetail.title: POI detail
xdm:poiDetail.description: Detail of the POI that cause the event.

xdm:poiEntries.description: The number of times a person has entered the point of interest (POI).

xdm:poiExits.description: The number of times a person has exited the point of interest (POI).

xdm:activePOIs.title: POI detail
xdm:activePOIs.description: Details of the points of interest (POIs) that cause the event.
